name: Mint Syrup
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, mint leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Stir water and sugar together in a saucepan until sugar dissolves. Add the mint. Place over medium heat and bring to a boil. Reduce to a simmer and cook for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand for 2 hours. Strain and refrigerate until cold. Either use to sweeten a pitcher of iced tea or place in a pitcher and let guests sweeten their tea to taste.
